meta.name: skills-launch-patterns
meta.purpose: Reusable patterns extracted from a skills.sh launch video build conversation.
remotion_principles: Avoid CSS animations and Tailwind animation classes.
Use Sequence/Series or TransitionSeries for scene timing.
Clamp interpolate ranges to avoid overshoot.

patterns.title: Skills launch composition
patterns.goal: Register a short, punchy launch video in a 16:9 landscape format.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a {{width}}x{{height}} Remotion composition named {{id}} using {{component}} for {{seconds}} seconds at {{fps}} fps and register it in Root.tsx.

notes: Keep Root.tsx as the registry of compositions.
Use explicit width/height/fps/durationInFrames.

patterns.title: TransitionSeries scene timeline
patterns.goal: Chain multiple scenes with fades and slides using TransitionSeries.
patterns.prompt_template: Build a SkillsVideo component that sequences {{sceneCount}} scenes using TransitionSeries with {{transitionType}} transitions and {{transitionFrames}} frame duration.

notes: Use TransitionSeries.Sequence for each scene.
Add TransitionSeries.Transition between scenes (fade/slide).
Transitions overlap and reduce total duration; account for this in total length.

patterns.title: ASCII logo reveal with glow
patterns.goal: Reveal an ASCII logo line-by-line with a subtle glow and tagline.
patterns.prompt_template: Animate an ASCII logo by revealing characters over {{revealSeconds}} seconds, then show a tagline below it.

notes: Compute charsToShow using interpolate(frame, [0, revealFrames], [0, totalChars]).
After reveal, apply a spring-driven glow via textShadow.
Add a subtle radial gradient behind the logo for depth.

patterns.title: Install command terminal scene
patterns.goal: Show a macOS-like terminal with a typewriter command and success output.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a terminal scene that types "{{command}}" with a blinking cursor and reveals success output after typing completes.

notes: Use spring() to scale the terminal in.
Type with string slicing; cursor uses opacity oscillation.
Success block fades in after typing completion.

patterns.title: Agent pill carousel
patterns.goal: Show a grid of agents as pill badges with a soft float and staggered entry.
patterns.prompt_template: Render agent pills for {{count}} agents with staggered spring entrances and subtle sinusoidal float.

notes: Each pill uses spring({frame, delay}) for entry.
Add a small float offset using Math.sin((frame + index * 10) / 20).
Use a centered flex-wrap grid with consistent gaps.

patterns.title: Scrolling leaderboard
patterns.goal: Scroll through a long leaderboard list with easing and fixed header.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a scrolling leaderboard that moves from rank {{startRank}} to {{endRank}} using a bezier eased interpolate curve.

notes: Compute maxScroll = targetRank * ROW_HEIGHT.
Use interpolate(frame, [start, end], [0, 1], easing) to drive scrollY.
Add top and bottom gradient fades to mask the list edges.

patterns.title: Top skills card list
patterns.goal: Display top skills as stacked cards with animated install counts.
patterns.prompt_template: Create leaderboard cards for top {{count}} skills; animate the install count per row after entry.

notes: Each row uses spring() for slide-in.
Install count animates with interpolate(frame, [delay+10, delay+40]).
Use tabular-nums to stabilize numeric width.

patterns.title: CTA with highlight and pulse
patterns.goal: Show the URL with a highlight sweep and a subtle pulse.
patterns.prompt_template: Animate a CTA that says "Visit" then highlights {{url}} with a left-to-right background sweep and gentle pulse.

notes: Use spring() to scale in the text.
Highlight is a div scaled on X with transformOrigin: left center.
Pulse uses a sine wave mapped through interpolate.
